channel.title: Night's Black Post-Mortem (Part One) Age of Ravens
channel.description: On the Gauntlet Blog I've posted part one of my post-mortem for *Night's Black Agents Express* , a seventeen session online series I recently wrapped. I talk about how well the hack's mechanics worked and the challenge of adapting published material. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/age-of-ravens-nba-underworld-promises-part-one

item.title: Night's Black Post-Mortem (Part One) Age of Ravens
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

On the Gauntlet Blog I’ve posted part one of my post-mortem for Night’s Black Agents Express , a seventeen session online series I recently wrapped. I talk about how well the hack’s mechanics worked and the challenge of adapting published material.

THE GAUNTLET

Age of Ravens: NBA Underworld Promises (Part One)

By Lowell Francis, Gauntlet Gaming Community Manager Last week I finished a 17 session series of Night’s Black Agents on the Gauntlet Gaming Calendar. It’s the longest online series I’ve run...

Read full topic
item.source: Night's Black Post-Mortem (Part One) Age of Ravens
